TRINITY '16, bookmarks an important achievement in the history of SNIST ,being the first ever fest in the college organized by the collaboration of the major Student clubs of the college. The Robotics Club SNIST, IEEE SNIST Student chapter and The Arts Club SNIST combined and collaborated together to make this vision of Dr. P. Narasimha Reddy, our beloved Executive Director to make into reality.


			TRINITY '16, A National Level Techno Robotics Literary Management Cultural Symposium, Is conducted from 23 January to 30 January. ROBOVEDA a National Level Exclusive Robotic Symposium, is an event set of TRINITY '16 which is ranked top among the National Level symposium across the country. ADASTRA , a National Level Techno Management Symposium, is a mix of technical Events, Workshops, Non Technical Events, Management Events, Electronics and Programming Events which would examine the technical potential of participants. RIGOLADE, a Literary Cultural Symposium,is a collection of all Cultural Events such as Nritya ( Dance ), Sargam ( Music ), Abhinaya( Dramatics ), Sahiti( Literature ) and Kalakriti( Craft Work ), which would encourage participants to also reveal their intrest towards extra-curricular activities.


			All in all, TRINITY '16 is a complete package for enthusiastic students, to explore their talent and to exhibit that in front of a humongous audience. Let's have fun!
